articles.content: In September, Attleboro, Massachusetts, Mayor Paul Heroux was devastated to learn his 10-year-old dog, Mura, had an aggressive blood cancer called hemangiosarcoma and had just months left to live. But after receiving the news, Heroux -- he was slated to take … [+1899 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Trump visit to US cemetery in France canceled due to rain
articles.description: President Donald Trump canceled a planned visit Saturday to a cemetery for Americans killed in World War I, the White House citing bad weather that grounded his helicopter.
articles.content: PARIS President Donald Trump canceled a planned visit Saturday to a cemetery for Americans killed in World War I, the White House citing bad weather that grounded his helicopter. Trump had been scheduled to lay a wreath and observe a moment of silence at the … [+1509 chars]
